def_en: The signing of a document is the act of writing your name to indicate that you agree with what it says or to say that you have been present to witness other people writing their signature.

def_cn: (运动队或唱片公司的)签约受聘者，签约受雇者
def_en: A signing is someone who has recently signed a contract agreeing to play for a sports team or work for a record company.

def_cn: (球员、歌手或乐队的)签约聘用，签约雇用
def_en: The signing of a player by a sports team or a group by a record company is the act of drawing up a legal document setting out the length and terms of the association between them.
Signing is the use of sign language to communicate with someone who is deaf.
